articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: 'High class digital scam' by Swiggy? Premium users paying more vs non-Swiggy One subscribers? What's the debate - ET Now
articles.description: The Swiggy One bill amounted to Rs 309, while the non-member, with the coupon, paid only Rs 241 for an identical order from the same restaurant, delivered to the same address at the same time.
articles.content: A Bengaluru resident has raised concerns over Swiggy's premium membership pricing. (Image: Shutterstock/ET NOW News)
